page.title: 08Pets: My Cat
page.content: {A cat} is a fur covered mammal with four legs, two pointed ears and a tail. I have three cats, two are ginger coloured one is black with a white tuft under its chin. My cats feed on tinned food, their favourite flavour is turkey They also like chicken scraps and fish They sometimes scratch me when I open tins for them they sometimes fight over the food. At night they lie on our beds or they go out for a run, sometimes they stay out all night. During the day day they usually lie in the shade or in the flower bed or in the big plant pots. They like to lie under the logan- berry bush in our garden.
